DOC.brief_summary: Introduction : Bile duct injury ( BDI ) cholecystectomy remain serious complication major implication patient outcome . For major BDIs , recommend method repair hepaticojejunostomy ( HJ ) . We conduct retrospective review 5 Danish hepatobiliary centre aim examine perioperative long-term outcome reconstructive HJ .
DOC.brief_title: Long Time Follow After HJ Following Iatrogenic Bile Duct Injuries
DOC.criteria: All patient iatrogenic Bile duct injury ( BDI ) cholecystectomy reconstruct hepatojejunostomy/choledochojejunostomy . Patients noncholecystectomyrelated BDI cholecystectomyrelated BDI definitively manage technique .
